propriedade.valor: SELECT numero, nome FROM dependentes where BUSCA_SEARCHBOX_VARCHAR2(numero,?,upper(nome),upper(?))=1 and numfunc = ? and flex_campo_03 is null order by numero

select dtini, dtfim, base, base || ' - ' || descricao descricao, percentual, tiporeaj, numsalfam, paga_13, paga_adiant_fer, paga_abono_const, paga_abono, obs, numfunc, numvinc, numdep, chavepa, pontpubl, pontlei, rowid_reg, emp_codigo, numero, nome, texto_publ, nomefunc, tiporeaj_desc, base_desc, ' ' as atos, 'Atributos do dependente' as atributos_depen, flex_campo_03, flex_campo_07, flex_campo_08, flex_campo_09, flex_campo_10, flex_campo_11 from cerg_ergadm00142_regr_pens_al where numfunc = ? and numvinc = ? and numero = nvl(?, numero) and base = nvl(?, base) and pack_hades.eh_concomitante(dtini, dtfim, nvl(?, pack_had_util.data_minima), nvl(?, pack_ergon.data_maxima)) = 1 order by nome, dtini, base
select numero, numero || ' - ' || nome nome from dependentes where numfunc = ? and flex_campo_03 is null order by numero

SELECT distinct rp.numpens, p.nome FROM regras_pensao rp, pensionistas p where p.numfunc = rp.numfunc and p.numvinc = rp.numvinc and p.numero = rp.numpens and p.numfunc = ? and p.numvinc = ? order by p.nome
select base, descricao descr from base_pensao where base not in ('PENSÃO AL MS605') order by base
